examples.example: 服务员微笑着对顾客说：“您好，请坐。”

translate.english: The waiter/waitress said to the customer with a smile, "Hello, please sit down."

examples.example: 客人进门后，主人热情地说：“请坐，快请坐。”

translate.english: After the guest enters the door, the host says warmly: "Please sit down, please sit down quickly."

examples.example: 公交车上，年轻人礼貌地对老人说：“爷爷，这边有座位，请坐。”

translate.english: On the bus, the young man politely said to the old man: "Grandpa, there is a seat here. Please sit down."
